title: MaskField Single Message Transform
description: Configuration schema for MaskField transformation. Masks field values with null or a replacement value.

type.description: The transformation type. Use 'org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.MaskField$Key' for key transformation or 'org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.MaskField$Value' for value transformation.
type.title: type

fields.description: Comma-separated list of field names to mask.
fields.title: fields

replacement.description: Replacement value to use when masking fields. If not specified, fields will be masked with null.
replacement.title: replacement

defaultSnippets.label: MaskField - Mask with null
defaultSnippets.description: Mask sensitive fields by setting them to null. Replace field names with the fields you want to mask (e.g., password, SSN, credit card).
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**MaskField** - Mask sensitive fields by setting them to `null`.

Replace field names with the fields you want to mask (e.g., `password`, `ssn`, `creditCard`).

**Use case:** Remove sensitive data before sending to downstream systems or logs.

defaultSnippets.label: MaskField - Mask with replacement value
defaultSnippets.description: Mask fields with a custom replacement value instead of null. Replace 'sensitiveField' and '***MASKED***' with your field name and replacement value.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**MaskField** - Mask fields with a custom replacement value instead of `null`.

Replace `sensitiveField` and `***MASKED***` with your field name and replacement value.

**Use case:** Replace sensitive data with a placeholder to indicate masking occurred.
